statements: DELETE FROM 5g_service_metrics WHERE id = 10 AND client_id = 100
DELETE FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE service_id = 10 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM 5g_performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100 AND metric_name = 'Latency';
